wama hegaliyanuwange aathmiya winynyanawadaya sabawinma wikara sahagatha aakarayakin punarjiwanaya kala ha pumbana lada anekuth noginiya haki cheda paseka thabuwada, manushya ithihasaya wataha gatha yuththe, “hamputhun saha kamkaru panthiya yana deparshawayema nirmanathmaka angaye, minisage mulikathwaye wardhanaya lesa ya” yana hilige kiyapama (7) nishchitha deshapalana aramunakata sewaya kale ya: enam kamkaru panthiye deshapalana swadhinathwaya thahawuru kirima matha padanamwu deshapalana kriyamargaya athahara damimata ya. 1983 wana wita klif slotar mema deshapalana swadhinathwaya kerehi warkars ligaya wishala washayen “awadharanaya kirimata” pahara dunneya.
